description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application, providing basic endpoints for health check, API documentation redirect, and welcome message, with Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for documentation.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation redirect, and welcome message, with Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message at the root endpoint '/'

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple health status string 'OK' at the '/health' endpoint

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns application information at the '/api/info' endpoint
